channel.title: Eating on chrislindsay.org
channel.description: Recent content in Eating on chrislindsay.org

item.title: Eating to Thrive.
item.description: Hi, thanks for taking the time to watch this live video. This is the second video on the series of How to Get Out of Survival Mode and in this video, I discuss nutrition. My name is Chris Lindsay, thanks for watching. Stress and eating. Stress can influence our food choices, so when you’re stressed out from whatever might be stressing you, your boss or colleagues, what foods do you crave?
